name: Meetlink
tag_list: b2b, software, collaboration, knowledge, sharing, start-up
overview:
Corporations face important challenges every day. These challenges might be organizational or strategic challenges, or challenges in the area of marketing and sales, or even HR. Better ways to solve key challenges are often sought after, as well as a systematic environment to transform the way a company approaches these problems. This is exactly what Meetlink.net offers: a safe, secure and highly structured cloud-based collaboration platform that provides a structured approach to problem recognition and problem solving.

Meetlink.netâ€™s unique challenge-based approach effectively structures and promotes communication, collaboration and knowledge sharing within and between teams, groups and departments.

With this challenge-based approach, Meetlink.net assists in establishing a knowledge sharing and collaborative culture within an organization that will help solve the challenges that matter to your organization.
